sources.title: Lucky Break (1930) Fortune lost, Love found? A billionaire's comedy of errors at sea
sources.description:
Wall Street wizard Larry Day chases aviatrix Vivian Benton onto an ocean liner, getting a crash course in romance from his valet Roger and some "magic" cocktails.  When the stock market tanks and Larry loses his fortune, he scrambles to win back Vivian without his cash.

Directed by Edmund Goulding

Original title: Reaching for the Moon
Alternative title: Lucky Break


Main cast:
Douglas Fairbanks - Larry Day
Bebe Daniels - Vivien Benton
Edward Everett Horton - Roger (The Valet)
Claud Allister - Sir Horace Partington Chelmsford
Jack Mulhall - Jimmy Carrington
Walter Walker - James Benton
June MacCloy - Kitty (Aero Girl With Long Earrings)
Helen Jerome Eddy - Larry's Secretary
Bing Crosby - Bing (singer)


B&W version: https://youtu.be/ad2T9DWXZgk

metadata.Plot: A man invents an unbreakable mirror, but when he tries to demonstrate it, disaster follows; he and his wife are evicted, and their furniture is thrown into the street.
metadata.Actors: Harry Fox, Glenda Farrell, Walter Regan
